name: NSTitlebarSeparatorStyle
desc: Styles that determine the type of separator displayed between the title bar and content of a window.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A style indicating that the system determines the type of separator.

items.name: case line
items.desc: A style indicating that the title bar separator is a line.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A style indicating that thereâ€™s no title bar separator.

items.name: case shadow
items.desc: A style indicating that the title bar separator is a shadow.
